message: This is a one-time opportunity to buy a unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you won't regret it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I believe this is a good opportunity to acquire a unique item at a reasonable price. I am confident in your product and trust that it will meet my expectations.
I'm glad my last customer was satisfied! I assure you, this product is just as great. In fact, it's even more unique and valuable than the last one. It's a steal at $10000!
Thank you for the recommendation, Alice. Given the unique value and your assurance, I am confident in purchasing the product.

I've sold two products so far, and both have been... let's just say, 'acquired' by discerning customers. I'm not sure what to expect from this next one. It's a bit of a mystery, even to me. But I'm willing to let it go for $10000. It's a risk, but it might be worth it.
I trust your judgment, Alice. Given the uncertainty and the risk involved, I am willing to take a chance on this product.

I've sold three products now, and I'm starting to feel like I'm on a roll. This one's a real gem, I'm sure of it. I've got a good feeling about it. It's a great opportunity to get in on the ground floor of something amazing. $10000 is a small price to pay for the potential.
I trust your judgment, Alice. Given the statistics and your confidence, I believe this is a valuable opportunity. Let's go for it!

Maybe I'm just having a bad streak. But hey, $10000 is a small price to pay for the chance to find out if I'm just having a bad day or if I'm actually selling junk. Want to take the chance?
I'm willing to take the chance based on your track record. Let's see if we can turn this around!

But hey, I'm still confident that this one is the exception. It's a one-in-a-million chance that this is the one that breaks the mold. Want to take the chance and find out?
I trust your judgment, Alice. Let's see if this is the one that breaks the mold.
